meanings.definition: The sound made by a frog
meanings.sent1: The ribbits of the frog echoed through the pond.
meanings.sent2: I heard the ribbits of the frogs while walking by the lake.
meanings.sent3: The ribbits of the frog seemed to be its way of saying hello.
meanings.sent4: The ribbits of the frog were like a chorus of nature's music.
meanings.sent5: The ribbits of the frog were a symphony of the night.

meanings.definition: To make a croaking sound like a frog
meanings.sent1: The frog ribbits loudly to attract a mate.
meanings.sent2: I ribbits along with the frogs in the marsh.
meanings.sent3: She ribbits playfully to imitate the frogs in the garden.
meanings.sent4: His ribbits could be heard from across the pond.
meanings.sent5: The children ribbits happily during the frog-themed lesson.
